notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, G.F.; Methodology, P.B. and G.F.; Validation, P.B. and G.F.; Formal analysis, M.B., F.M., L.C. and P.B.; Investigation, M.B., F.M., L.C., P.S.C., K.N. and C.G.; Resources, C.G. and G.F.; Writing—original draft preparation, M.B., F.M., L.C. and P.S.C.; Writing—review and editing, C.G., P.B. and G.F.; Validation, P.B. and G.F.; Visualization, all the authors; Supervision, G.F.; Funding acquisition, G.F. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
